intension: Design a gift certificate for a website or store that sells electronic gadgets and accessories, emphasizing on the modern and innovative aspect of the products. The website address is www.wizard.com.
globalcaption: The image features a gift certificate with a green background. The gift certificate is adorned with various electronic devices, including a cell phone, a laptop, and a computer mouse. The cell phone is located on the left side of the gift certificate, while the laptop is positioned in the middle, and the computer mouse is on the right side. The combination of the gift certificate and the electronic devices creates a visually appealing and modern design.
keywords: technology, electronic, digital, device, equipment, modern, electronics, accessories, smart, gadget, certificate, green, bright

bglayer.bgcaption: The image features a green background with a black and white illustration of various computer components. There are three computer mice in the scene, with one on the left side, one in the middle, and another on the right side. Additionally, there are three keyboards, with one on the left side, one in the middle, and another on the right side. \n\nA cell phone is also present in the image, located towards the left side. The arrangement of the computer components and the cell phone creates a visually appealing and organized display
